meanings.definition: The realm or domain beyond the natural world.
meanings.sent1: Legends often speak of creatures from supernature visiting our world.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the mysteries of supernature can be both thrilling and daunting.
meanings.sent3: In the story, the hero discovered a hidden portal to supernature behind a waterfall.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared, envisioning supernature as a magical forest beyond the stars.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting depicted a breathtaking landscape inspired by supernature.

meanings.definition: A supernatural or divine force or power.
meanings.sent1: The ancient prophecy foretold the awakening of a great supernature to save the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: Many believe in the existence of a benevolent supernature guiding our destinies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child blamed supernature for hiding his favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: Love was described as a powerful supernature that binds souls together.
meanings.sent5: The storm's fury seemed to be fueled by a malevolent supernature seeking vengeance.
